programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Iskandar has a rough first day at work, but more trouble to come for him in the form of Rahmat. Anthony comes down hard on Brayden as PSLE approaches, leading to resentment and frustration.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Because You're My Teacher
programme.desc: (Encore) This Teachers' Day, On The Red Dot helps Abdul Malik Hassan and Anand K. celebrate that one special teacher who has transformed their lives, for them to show their gratitude before it is too late.

programme.title: Whispers Of The Dead
programme.desc: On her supposed wedding day, Nah Jia Xin is found dead at the entrance of her home with several stab wounds.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: Extreme
programme.desc: America's Got Talent: Extreme is an American reality television and talent competition series created by Simon Cowell. The series is a spinoff of America's Got Talent that focuses on stunt performers. Showcasing the most outrageous, unique and jaw-dropping acts of enormous scale and magnitude that simply can't be confined to a theater stage.

programme.title: Animals At Play
programme.desc: A team of scientists and experts takes us around the world to meet the wild animals that love to have fun as they ask three big questions....why do animals play, could animals have a sense of fun and what can animal play tell us about ourselves. This series is driven by immersive personal encounters with nature's most playful creatures, practical demos in the wild and innovative new camera techniques.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Inside The Box With Jack Stein
programme.desc: Jack and Polly meet up at the Borough markets in London to sample a mouth watering cheese toasty, while Polly quizzes and corrects Jack about the curiously names Welsh Rarebit, which in Jack's humble opinion, is the greatest cheese toasted sandwich on Earth. After the history lesson, Jack cooks his gooey, grilled version and then lands in Malmo Sweden, the vegetarian capital of Northern Europe.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40
programme.desc: All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Freshly Picked With Simon Toohey S2
programme.desc: Kicking things off today is pure donut indulgence, and next it's pizza pocket perfection with a mushroom filling. Blayne Bertoncello is in adding a bit of sizzle to the humble radish, and Simon heads to Sarafian Hummus headquarters.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals For Every Day
programme.desc: Join Jamie at home with his family in Essex for delicious, family-focused food for real life, every day In this brand new series, we join the nation's favourite chef at his country home, where he's cooking up tasty, healthy recipes from his new book 7 Ways: Easy Ideas for Every Day of the Week. Inspired by his own home cooking, based around simple, crowd-pleasing family meals that are creative but pressure-free, Jamie mostly uses 8 ingredients or less, with plenty of versatility.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Surge [S5]
programme.desc: A legend of legends, Valt Aoi hosts an exhibition match featuring a revolutionary class of Bey: Lightning Beys. Inspired by the battle, two unknown brothers, Hyuga and Hikaru Hizashi, issue a challenge: armed with their solar Beys Hyperion and Helios, this unlikely duo is going to topple Beyblade's ruling elite.

But when he takes time manipulation too far, he will have to act fast to save his friend Triangle Man before it's too late. The squares want to give the alien a birthday present. They don't have any money and decide to upcycle their only toy car and give that as a gift. After all the best kind of gift is the one that comes from the heart. Isn't it?

programme.desc: 千年前的《泗州志》留下预言，人与自然需要达成平衡，否则将引发一场毁灭世界的灾难。在灾难来临之前，必须分别找齐三个世界的三把钥匙，获得拯救世界的机会。但正如历史所证明的那样，人与自然的平衡并不是一件容易的事情。因为人类和动物总是会引发一些问题。无论他们是不是有意为之，但往往会过度开发，过度使用他们的环境，破坏精妙的生态平衡，并将这个世界送上毁灭的道路。幸运的是，骄傲勇敢的水精灵带领伙伴们组成了一支强大的环保特攻队。他们将勇敢地面对这场危机，并不惜一切代价拯救湿地世界，为后代保护好这个世界.
